name: Typing Tutor Plus Word Invaders
overview: Typing Tutor Plus Word Invaders is an Educational game, developed and published by Academy Software, which was released in Europe in 1986. THE MOST EFFECTIVE WAY TO LEARN TOUCH TYPING! Two great programs in one package. Learn to use your keyboard quickly and properly. TYPING TUTOR starts with the 'home keys' and automatically evaluates your typing performance, introducing you to new keys in many gradual steps as your skills develop. WORD INVADERS puts real excitement into your touch typing practice while rein- forcing proper typing techniques.
